radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal cardiac function with mild mitral and aortic regurgitation.
Possible noncompaction cardiomyopathy without valvular abnormalities.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved hemoglobin A1c from 10.4% to 5.7% after 1 year of metreleptin therapy.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Revealed pulmonary hypertension with pulmonary artery pressure of 36 mm Hg.
Revealed nephromegaly and bilateral kidney cysts.
Left ventricular ejection fraction declined to 15%.
